thread.title: University of Louisiana at Lafayette Student Chapter Participates in Petroleum Engineering Crawfish Boil
thread.title_full: University of Louisiana at Lafayette Student Chapter Participates in Petroleum Engineering Crawfish Boil

author: Katie Carr
title: University of Louisiana at Lafayette Student Chapter Participates in Petroleum Engineering Crawfish Boil
text: [vc_row gap=”35″ el_class=”iadc-content”][vc_column][vc_column_text] The IADC University of Louisiana at Lafayette (ULL) Student Chapter recently participated in the ULL Petroleum Engineering Crawfish Boil. It was a beautiful day with great weather and an excellent turnout. Events like this provide a wonderful opportunity for networking in a laid back environment. [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_media_grid element_width=”6″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1749668073183-4099fc0c-27c0-10″ include=”440745,440746,440748,440749″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
